00026 #include "lpc17xx_adc.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00029 #include "lpc17xx_nvic.h"
00030 #include "lpc17xx_gpdma.h"
00031 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"

00033 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00038 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00039 #define MCB_LPC_1768
00040 //#define IAR_LPC_1768
00041 
00042 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00043 #define _ADC_INT                ADC_ADINTEN2
00044 #define _ADC_CHANNEL    ADC_CHANNEL_2
00045 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00046 #define _ADC_INT                ADC_ADINTEN5
00047 #define _ADC_CHANNEL    ADC_CHANNEL_5
00048 #endif
00049 
00051 #define DMA_SIZE                1
00052 
00053 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00054 uint8_t  menu1[] =
00055                 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00056                 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00057                 " ADC demo \n\r"
00058                 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00059                 "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00060                 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200bps \n\r"
00061                 " DMA testing : ADC peripheral to memory\n\r"
00062                 " Use ADC with 12-bit resolution rate of 200KHz\n\r"
00063                 " Value ADC channel is displayed by UART, this value is taken from destination memory value of DMA function \n\r"
00064                 " Turn the potentiometer to see how ADC value changes\n\r"
00065                 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00066 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00067 uint8_t menu2[] = "ADC value on channel 2: ";
00068 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00069 uint8_t menu2[] = "ADC value on channel 5: ";
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 /* Terminal Counter flag for Channel 0 */
00073 __IO uint32_t Channel0_TC;
00074 
00075 /* Error Counter flag for Channel 0 */
00076 __IO uint32_t Channel0_Err;
00077 
00078 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTION *************************/
00079 void DMA_IRQHandler (void);
00080 
00081 void print_menu(void);
00082 
00083 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00084 /*********************************************************************/
00089 void DMA_IRQHandler (void)
00090 {
00091         // check GPDMA interrupt on channel 0
00092         if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INT, 0)){
00093                 // Check counter terminal status
00094                 if(GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTTC, 0)){
00095                         // Clear terminate counter Interrupt pending
00096                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTTC, 0);
00097                                 Channel0_TC++;
00098                 }
00099                 // Check error terminal status
00100                 if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTERR, 0)){
00101                         // Clear error counter Interrupt pending
00102                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTERR, 0);
00103                         Channel0_Err++;
00104                 }
00105         }
00106 }
00107 
00108 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00109 /*********************************************************************/
00114 void print_menu(void)
00115 {
00116         _DBG(menu1);
00117 }
00118 
00119 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00120 /*********************************************************************/
00125 int c_entry(void)
00126 {
00127         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00128         GPDMA_Channel_CFG_Type GPDMACfg;
00129         uint32_t adc_value, tmp;
00130 
00131         /* Initialize ADC ----------------------------------------------------*/
00132 
00133         /* Because the potentiometer on different boards (MCB & IAR) connect
00134          * with different ADC channel, so we have to configure correct ADC channel
00135          * on each board respectively.
00136          * If you want to check other ADC channels, you have to wire this ADC pin directly
00137          * to potentiometer pin (please see schematic doc for more reference)
00138          */
00139 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00140         /* If using MCB1700 v.1 board
00141          * select P0.25 as AD0.2
00142          */
00143         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00144         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00145         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00146         PinCfg.Pinnum = 25;
00147         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00148         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00149 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00150         /* If using IAR LPC1768 KS v.A board:
00151          * select P1.31 as AD0.5
00152          */
00153         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00154         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00155         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00156         PinCfg.Pinnum = 31;
00157         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00158         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00159 #endif
00160 
00161         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00162          * – 115200bps
00163          * – 8 data bit
00164          * – No parity
00165          * – 1 stop bit
00166          * – No flow control
00167          */
00168         debug_frmwrk_init();
00169 
00170         // print welcome screen
00171         print_menu();
00172 
00173         /*  Configuration for ADC :
00174          *  Select: ADC channel 2 (if using MCB1700 board)
00175          *          ADC channel 5 (if using IAR-LPC1768 board)
00176          *      ADC conversion rate = 200KHz
00177          */
00178         ADC_Init(LPC_ADC, 200000);
00179         ADC_IntConfig(LPC_ADC,_ADC_INT,SET);
00180         ADC_ChannelCmd(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL,SET);
00181 
00182         /* GPDMA block section -------------------------------------------- */
00183         /* Disable GPDMA interrupt */
00184         NVIC_DisableIRQ(DMA_IRQn);
00185         /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00186         NVIC_SetPriority(DMA_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00187 
00188         /* Initialize GPDMA controller */
00189         GPDMA_Init();
00190 
00191         // Setup GPDMA channel --------------------------------
00192         // channel 0
00193         GPDMACfg.ChannelNum = 0;
00194         // Source memory - unused
00195         GPDMACfg.SrcMemAddr = 0;
00196         // Destination memory
00197         GPDMACfg.DstMemAddr = (uint32_t) &adc_value;
00198         // Transfer size
00199         GPDMACfg.TransferSize = DMA_SIZE;
00200         // Transfer width - unused
00201         GPDMACfg.TransferWidth = 0;
00202         // Transfer type
00203         GPDMACfg.TransferType = GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_P2M;
00204         // Source connection
00205         GPDMACfg.SrcConn = GPDMA_CONN_ADC;
00206         // Destination connection - unused
00207         GPDMACfg.DstConn = 0;
00208         // Linker List Item - unused
00209         GPDMACfg.DMALLI = 0;
00210         GPDMA_Setup(&GPDMACfg);
00211 
00212         /* Reset terminal counter */
00213         Channel0_TC = 0;
00214         /* Reset Error counter */
00215         Channel0_Err = 0;
00216 
00217         /* Enable GPDMA interrupt */
00218         NVIC_EnableIRQ(DMA_IRQn);
00219 
00220         while (1) {
00221 
00222                 // Enable GPDMA channel 0
00223                 GPDMA_ChannelCmd(0, ENABLE);
00224 
00225                 ADC_StartCmd(LPC_ADC,ADC_START_NOW);
00226                 /* Wait for GPDMA processing complete */;
00227                 while ((Channel0_TC == 0) );
00228 
00229                 // Disable GPDMA channel 0
00230                 GPDMA_ChannelCmd(0, DISABLE);
00231 
00232                 //Display the result of conversion on the UART0
00233                 _DBG(menu2);
00234                 _DBD32(ADC_DR_RESULT(adc_value));
00235                 _DBG_("");
00236 
00237                 // Wait for a while
00238                 for(tmp = 0; tmp < 1000000; tmp++);
00239 
00240                 /* GPDMA Re-setup */
00241                 GPDMA_Setup(&GPDMACfg);
00242 
00243                 /* Reset terminal counter */
00244                 Channel0_TC = 0;
00245                 /* Reset Error counter */
00246                 Channel0_Err = 0;
00247         }
00248         ADC_DeInit(LPC_ADC);
00249         return 1;
00250 }
00251 
00252 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00253 int main (void)
00254 {
00255         return c_entry();
00256 }
00257 
00258 #ifdef  DEBUG
00259 /*******************************************************************************
00260 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00261 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00262 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00263 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00264 * @return               None
00265 *******************************************************************************/
00266 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00267 {
00268         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00269          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00270 
00271         /* Infinite loop */
00272         while(1);
00273 }
00274 #endif
